Part 1:  (5 parts - click on replies for more) 

Ye Hau wander into the peach blossom field.  Bai Qian is drinking wine on the blossom tree when she noticed Ye Hau.  She decided to play a trick on him.  Bai Qian purposely made it seems like she was going to fall off the tree branch.  Ye Hau noticed her and rush over to catch her.  

Seeing her face up close, a shock Ye Hau whispered “Su Su.”  Using her magic power, Bai Qian vanished in front of him.  In panic, Ye Hau started to frantically look for her.  Ye Hau decided that he is probably in a trance and decided to come back after attending the banquet from the Sea King.  

Meanwhile, Bai Qian is sleeping at Zhe Yan’s place.  Bai Qian smile and thought that it was a very interesting dream.  Zhe Yan walk in and asked what kind of dream could make her mood so happy.  Bai Qian told him that she had a peach blossom dream (meaning love encounter) with a young man.  Zhe Yan asked such an interesting dream and if Bai Qian remember how the young man looks like.  Bai Qian told Zhe Yan it is all his wine’s fault.  The wine was too strong and she can barely see the moonlight let alone his face.

All she remember is that he was wearing a dark color robe.  Zhe Yan give her some of his wine for the banquet and asked her to talk to Bai Zhen (her fourth brother) for him.  Bai Qian refuses and said she doesn’t want to get yell at.  Zhe Yan was going to give her a polite gesture when she refuses and said she didn’t want to get hit by lighting.

Part 2:

Bai Qian open the gateway to the sea palace but was stop by another goddess.  She asked Bai Qian to help lead the way.  Once they arrived, she asked if Bai Qian knows the prince of Heaven.  Bai Qian said she doesn’t know and wonders off.  The princess’s maids are gossiping and told their princess not to worry.  They told her that with the princess’s beauty, Ye Hau will definitely remember her.  They also called Bai Qian an old lady bc so far no one has seen her and think she is probably ugly due to her old age.  

Two of Mo Yuan’s disciples saw the second prince of Ghost tribe (also current King of ghost tribe) and is upset.  The Sea king notice the argument and immediately came and play the peace maker.  

Meanwhile, Ye Hau’s two male attendants are still looking for Ye Hau’s son.  The little boy is busy digging and caught Bai Qian’s attention.  She call him a little sticky rice ball and asked why he is digging.  He answer that his dad told him beneath the seaweed are beautiful jewels and he wants to see them for himself.  He has never seen them before and he wants to dig and see for himself.  

Knowing that he is part of the heaven tribe, Bai Qian give him a magic fan.  Ah Li swing the fan and immediately blow away the seaweed.  The bright light hurt Bai Qian’s eyes and a piece of cloth immediately appeared and shelter her eyes.

Ah Li asked if he is in trouble.  Bai Qian told him that he is not the only one in trouble bc the fan belongs to her.  Ah Li turned around and saw Bai Qian with the white cloth and immediately call out “mother.”  

Ye Hau walk into the scene and saw Ah Li hugging Bai Qian.  Bai Qian use her magic power and took away the cloth sheltering her eyes.  She thought it was her master Mo Yuan when she saw Ye Hau.  However, she quickly realized it is not her master.  Ye Hau try to grab her hand and she brush it off and said, “how dare you.”

Shao Xin found Bai Qian and kneel down wanting forgiveness for her action.  She asked Bai Qian why she refuses to see her and said she doesn’t want anything other than her forgiveness.  Bai Qian told her that she will granted her one wish and after that there will be nothing between them.  

Shao Xin is confused why Bai Qian is mad at her bc she never meet Sang Ji and wouldn’t be happy with him.  Also without Sang Ji she end up with a better future husband.  During this whole time, Ye Hau is noticing how Bai Qian has the same habits as Su Su (tapping fingers while talking and smelling her fan).  

Shao Xin told Bai Qian that Ye Hau is a great man and if Shao Xin loses Sang Ji then she really has nothing.  While talking, Ye Hau saw the same scar on Bai Qian’s arm as Su Su.  

Bai Qian asked if she remember the people who used to pick on her.  In that group there are probably some who doesn’t want to harm her but if they try to protect her they would probably end up getting pick on.  Therefore, they do it bc they don’t want to get pick on.  Bai Qian asked if she will ever forgive any of them.  Shao Xin said no.  Bai Qian said bc of her and Sang Ji she become a laughing stock.  She continues that it took her hundred thousands years to reach her status and her knowledge of love must be quite low.

Part 4:

Ah Li runs toward Bai Qian and asked why she said she is not a great caring goddess.  Her son told her that mother is the most caring goddess in all heaven.  Bai Qian asked if he pop out of ground and Ah Li said he came with father to look for mother.  Bai Qian is quite upset that Ye Hau is eavesdropping in their conversation.  Ye Hau apologize for not noticing that she is Bai Qian from Qing Qiu.  

Bai Qian said she is older than him by 90,000 years old and insisted that Ye Hau called her aunt.  Ye Hau told Bai Qian that it doesn’t make sense that his son can called her mother but he needs to call her Aunt.  Bai Qian try to scold Ye Hau for eavesdropping but Ah Li said mother were looking for them so they came looking for mother.  But since they saw mother talking to another lady they decided to stay out of the way.  

Ah Li asked if mother is coming back to heaven with them bc she misses them too.  Bai Qian said she turn around bc she got lost.  Ye Hau cut her off and told Ah Li that his mother misses them .  Ah Li said mother is the best and want to know when she will come back with them.  

Ah Li ask if mother is excited bc she hasn’t been home for a long time.  Ah Li said since mother already finish talking then they should get going.          

Bai Qian told them to wait and that she needs to tell the other lady one more thing.  Bai Qian told Shao Xin to think about what she want.  Since Shao Xin used to serve her, Bai Qian give her the fan and said she can bring the fan and asked her for one request.  After that there will be nothing between them.

Part 5:

At this time, the sea prince came and asked Bai Qian (not knowing who she is) why she is making a mess during such important event.  Bai Qian know she can’t make Ah Li takes the fault so she told a little white lie.  She told him that she is here in place of Bai Qian of Qing Qiu.  Since she hasn’t been outside of Peach Blossom for a long time she apologizes for making a scene.  Knowing that she is associated with the high goddess Bai Qian, the sea prince immediately change his attitude.

Bai Qian hand the sea prince some wines and the night jewel that she had previously prepared and try to escape the dreadful banquet.  However, Ye Hau grab her hand and force her to attend with him and Ah Li.  

No one knows her identity at the banquet and many thought that Bai Qian didn’t show up.  God and goddess were gossiping that Bai Qian didn’t show bc it is so weird to be in presence of her ex fiancé and current fiance.

The second prince (current king of ghost tribe) wanders outside absent minded because he is still looking for Si Yin.  

During the banquet, Mou Qing, the princess of the southern seas took part of the dance in hope of catching Ye Hau’s eyes.  The princess’s brother asked Ye Hau if he can meet with his sister.  Bai Qian told Ah Li that they are going to find his father so she can give him back to his father.  Ah Li smiles and said mother is using Ah Li as an excuses to go looking for father.  He asked if mother is afraid that father is meeting other woman behind her back.

Bai Qian gently smack his head and ask why he is always thinking about things like that.  The two chat on the way and Bai Qian found out that Ah Li’s mother is a moral and not Su Jin.  Ah Li wonders why mother forget everything.  Bai Qian told him that she doesn’t want to ruin the beautiful moments between Ye Hau and the princess.  Ah Li start crying and said mother doesn’t want him and father anymore.  

Ah Li continues that father is going to marry someone else and mother will marry someone else.  Ah Li is really going to be like his name and no one will want him.  Feeling bad, Bai Qian said of course she loves his father.  She said his father is like her heart, her liver, her baby and her sweetheart.  Feeling satisfied with her answer, Ah Li drag his mother to where the two were meeting.  

The sea princess saw them and asked Bai Qian who she is.  Bai Qian told her that Ah Li calls her mother so who does she think she is.  Immediately, sea princess kneel down and said she just want to stay besides the prince.  She also continues that her future husband is a playboy and she doesn’t want to get marry to him.  

Bai Qian knows that she is lying bc her future husband is a disciple of Mo Yuan.  (she is #17 disciple and the princess’s future husband is #1 disciple).  She sense that the princess has already fallen for Ye Hau so even if she marry Die Feng, he wouldn’t be happy.   

The princess said it doesn’t matter if she can only be a maid.  Bai Qian told Ah Li that she doesn’t want to get between them and try to leave.  

Ah Li said don’t leave and didn’t mother just say that father is your heart, your liver, your honey and your sweetheart.  Then how come she is letting other woman steal father away.  Ye Hau is thrilled at hearing those words and repeat them as he walk closer to Bai Qian.  Ye Hau asked if she is acting or pretending with him.  Feeling embarrassed, Bai Qian leaves but dropping her cloth (the one used to cover her eyes) in the process.  

Ah Li asked why father is not chasing after mother.  Ye Hau picks up the white cloth and told Ah Li that there is no need bc he knows where to find mother.  They are going to the peach blossom bc he has few things that he need to ask Zhe Yan.
